attributes.action: pass a law preventing stupid names being issued to new born babies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In particular inanimate objects i.e. 'Pebbles', 'Apple', 'Fence' etc.  Children with these names will be bullied in school which will ruin their lives.  This is tantamount to manslaughter.  Sensible names only thanks.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
